name: Heat It Up
about: A song with a good lesson for handling time properly.
lyrics:
Turn around! 
Look at what you've done. 
Had a lot of fun. 
Every time avoided it 
Saying, "Life has just begun!". 
You found no way 
And chose to stay. 
Therefore remember 
Every single day will pay! 

OK. 
Heat it up! Take a bit of time and get it on. 
Heat it up! It might take a while to let it off. 
Heat it up! La la la la la la la. 
La la la la la. 

Heat it up now! 
Heat it up now  
Because you don't know:  
You're going to see me there.   

Look ahead! Our fate is going to take us to the way. 
Look above! The growing entropy will lead us to the way. 
Dealing with the buzzing around us 
Scrolling through bridges about us. 
Everything cannot be same 
When these confessions surround us. 
Look across! Those angels will be waiting on our way. 

Watch out! 
Heat it up! Make it up before you're taken up. 
Heat it up! Time is little so begin now. 
Heat it up! Na na na na na na na. 
Na na na na na. 
Heat it up! Take a bit of time and get it on.  
Heat it up! It might take a while to let it off.  
Heat it up! La la la la la la la.  
La la la la la. 

Heat it up now! 
Heat it up now 
Because you don't know:  
You're going to see me there.
